div.em: Current conditions as of 20 Apr 18:35 pm CDT

div.div: Mostly clear, with a low around 35. Breezy, with a north wind 18 to 23 mph decreasing to 5 to 10 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 34 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 68. Light and variable wind becoming west southwest 5 to 8 mph in the afternoon.
Mostly clear, with a low around 47. South southwest wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.
